== Huliyar Amanikere (610106) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Huliyar Amanikere is a village in the [[Chiknayakanhalli ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 381.52 hectares and harbouring 71 households with total population of 254 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chikkanayakanahalli]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 121 and female population is 133. Scheduled Caste Population is 13 and Scheduled Tribes population is 15. Census Location Code of the village is 610106<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 205 (80.71%)
* Literate male population: 106 (87.6%)
* Literate female population: 99 (74.44%)
